issue.title: www.hellomarket.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.hellomarket.com/search?q=%EC%94%BD%ED%81%AC%ED%8C%A8%EB%93%9C+%EB%85%B8%ED%8A%B8%EB%B6%81](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.hellomarket.com%2Fsearch%3Fq%3D%25EC%2594%25BD%25ED%2581%25AC%25ED%258C%25A8%25EB%2593%259C%2B%25EB%2585%25B8%25ED%258A%25B8%25EB%25B6%2581) ### Comment Username: @bokkwonsu > 헬로마켓 웹사이트에서 상품 검색이 왜 안되는지 그 이유를 찾았습니다. > > 구글 크롬 브라우저에 'AdGuard'라는 광고 차단 확정프로그램을 설치하여 사용하는데 광고 차단을 활성화하면 상품 검색 시에 결과가 노출되지 않고, 광고 차단을 비활성화하면 상품 검색 시에 결과가 노출됩니다. > > 'AdGuard'라는 광고 차단 확정프로그램을 설치하셔서 다시한번 재확인 부탁드리고, 광고가 아닌 상품 검색결과가 차단되는 것은 필터 문제인거 같아 'AdGuard' 측에 필터 수정을 요청하셔야 될거 같습니다 > > https://adguard.com/ko/ ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/9zYzAhb.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/yO1YdLP.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.0.204 Browser: | Chrome Stealth mode: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Social Widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

AdGuard Annoyances

AdGuard Russian,
AdGuard Chinese,
AdGuard Japanese,

Liste AR,

issue.title: youtube.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

7.10.2

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.youtube.com/c/iXBTgames/about

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Russian filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

из-за фильтра счетчиков и систем аналитики не открываются ссылки на сторонние сайты


<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/38764610/185666013-450b3844-aa81-4f0c-9e67-8ed9396bd0aa.png)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot 2:</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/38764610/185666228-c7119322-d981-4425-9892-8d9591f4190f.png)

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: deviantart.com

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: A: In progress

issue.body:

labels.name: A: In progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.hellomarket.com/search?q=%EC%94%BD%ED%81%AC%ED%8C%A8%EB%93%9C+%EB%85%B8%ED%8A%B8%EB%B6%81](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.hellomarket.com%2Fsearch%3Fq%3D%25EC%2594%25BD%25ED%2581%25AC%25ED%258C%25A8%25EB%2593%259C%2B%25EB%2585%25B8%25ED%258A%25B8%25EB%25B6%2581) ### Comment Username: @bokkwonsu > 헬로마켓 웹사이트에서 상품 검색이 왜 안되는지 그 이유를 찾았습니다. > > 구글 크롬 브라우저에 'AdGuard'라는 광고 차단 확정프로그램을 설치하여 사용하는데 광고 차단을 활성화하면 상품 검색 시에 결과가 노출되지 않고, 광고 차단을 비활성화하면 상품 검색 시에 결과가 노출됩니다. > > 'AdGuard'라는 광고 차단 확정프로그램을 설치하셔서 다시한번 재확인 부탁드리고, 광고가 아닌 상품 검색결과가 차단되는 것은 필터 문제인거 같아 'AdGuard' 측에 필터 수정을 요청하셔야 될거 같습니다 > > https://adguard.com/ko/ ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/9zYzAhb.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/yO1YdLP.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.0.204 Browser: | Chrome Stealth mode: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Social Widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Annoyances:
AdGuard Annoyances

issue.title: google.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.google.com.tr/intl/tr/ads/publisher/partners/success-stories/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Turkish filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, EasyList, EasyPrivacy, uBO filters

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

`https://www.google.com.tr/intl/tr/ads/publisher/partners/success-stories/`



<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![resim](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/110184059/186084390-6c7e4edb-5dc4-42a1-b2e3-3c39b834e428.png)


</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot 2:</summary>

![resim](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/110184059/186084432-7d177876-e5c6-492c-90cc-2fdb25d0ab90.png)


</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: Fixed, filters update should be available in 1-2 hours.
